name: Winger
description:
Description:
• Take control of Winger and help him save his little brother. Defeat bad enemies and collect stars throughout this short and fun little adventure.

Instructions:
Move with Arrow Keys.
Pause the game with 'P' key.
Perform an action with 'H/B/M' keys.

Game Dimensions: 800x480

Game Category: Action, Arcade, Adventure, Other

Movement: Arrow Keys
Fire / Action: Spacebar Key
Jump: Not Available
